original_text: Then he had everyone in Jerusalem and Benjamin pledge themselves to it; the people of Jerusalem did this in accordance with the covenant of God, the God of their ancestors.
korean_text: 예루살렘과 베냐민에 있는 자들이 다 여기에 참여하게 하매 예루살렘 주민이 하나님 곧 그의 조상들의 하나님의 언약을 따르니라

sentences.original_text: Then he had everyone in Jerusalem and Benjamin
the people of Jerusalem did this
in accordance with the covenant of God
